none: Prichard and Constance, London and New York. "Perfumers by royal appointment to the queen of the Belgians." Text: "Amami Talcum may be obtained at most high class stores in beautiful 25c. boxes. Amami Talcum is always appropriate. Its elusive, yet persistent fragrance breathes dainty refinement."
